Key Match Events: India made a commanding total of 184 for 6, thanks mainly to a superlative return to the runs for KL Rahul (50 off 32), and another chapter in Virat Kohli's spectacular form, as he made 66 no out off 44.
Litton blasted seven fours and three sixes inside the first seven overs, Bangladesh had an excellent foundation. They were 66 for no loss when rains interrupted and curtailed the match.

When Litton blasted seven fours and three sixes inside the first seven overs, Bangladesh had an excellent foundation. They were 66 for no loss when rains interrupted and curtailed the match. At that time, Najmul Hossain Shanto (Litton's opening partner), was seven off 16.
Litton was run out by an excellent direct hit from KL Rahul. He only faced one ball after the rain break. He was out for 60 off 27.
India secured a hard-fought five-run victory, to take them to the top of Group 2.
Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predicted a close game between the two rival teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Adelaide, November 02, 2022, ICC Men's T20 World Cup
